solution_line_template: In one hour, Addison mountain's temperature will decrease to {decrease_fraction} of the temperature it is now, meaning the temperature will decrease to {decrease_fraction}*{current_temperature}=<<{decrease_fraction}*{current_temperature}={new_temperature}>>{new_temperature} degrees.
The temperature decrease will be {current_temperature}-{new_temperature}=<<{current_temperature}-{new_temperature}={temperature_decrease}>>{temperature_decrease} degrees
